LanguageData.ZeroMechanites.stages.0.label: 轻度疼痛
LanguageData.ZeroMechanites.stages.1.label: 剧烈疼痛

LanguageData.Irradiation.description: The flow of radiation negatively affects your condition.

LanguageData.Irradiation.stages.1.label: 最初的

LanguageData.Irradiation.stages.4.label: 严重的
LanguageData.Irradiation.stages.5.label: 极端的
LanguageData.OxygenStarvation.label: 缺氧
LanguageData.OxygenStarvation.description: Lack of oxygen, threatening to develop into a lethal stage.
LanguageData.OxygenStarvation.stages.0.label: 最初的
LanguageData.OxygenStarvation.stages.1.label: 最初的
LanguageData.OxygenStarvation.stages.2.label: 少量的
LanguageData.OxygenStarvation.stages.3.label: 中等的
LanguageData.OxygenStarvation.stages.4.label: 严重的
LanguageData.OxygenStarvation.stages.5.label: 极端的
LanguageData.Fibrodysplasia.label: 纤维发育不良
LanguageData.Fibrodysplasia.description: A rare and serious disease that gradually destroys body tissue.
LanguageData.Fibrodysplasia.stages.0.label: 少量的
LanguageData.Fibrodysplasia.stages.1.label: 容易的
LanguageData.Fibrodysplasia.stages.2.label: 中等的
LanguageData.Fibrodysplasia.stages.3.label: 坚硬的
LanguageData.Fibrodysplasia.stages.4.label: 超硬的
LanguageData.NeurofibromatousWorms.label: 神经纤维瘤蠕虫
LanguageData.NeurofibromatousWorms.description: A disease that develops under the influence of intractable parasites in the brain. Characterized by gradual loss of vision and hearing.
LanguageData.NeurofibromatousWorms.stages.0.label: 容易的
LanguageData.NeurofibromatousWormsFinal.label: 神经纤维瘤蠕虫（死脑阶段）
LanguageData.NeurofibromatousWormsFinal.description: The final stage of the disease, leading to complete loss of hearing and vision.
LanguageData.CaveBettleBuff.label: 夜狩
LanguageData.CaveBettleBuff.description: The evolutionary mechanism of metabolic acceleration at a natural level of illumination for the body.
LanguageData.ThirstHumanMeat.label: 人肉渴求
LanguageData.ThirstHumanMeat.description: Feeling of euphoria caused by eating human remains.
LanguageData.PoisonBite.label: Poison bite
LanguageData.PoisonBite.description: Acid and enzymes that enter the affected area interfere with healing and cause loss of coordination.
LanguageData.PoisonBite.stages.0.label: early
LanguageData.PoisonBite.stages.1.label: poisoning
LanguageData.PoisonBite.stages.2.label: severe poisoning
LanguageData.PoisonBite.stages.3.label: dangerous poisoning
LanguageData.BioChemicRegeneration.label: Biochemical regeneration
LanguageData.BioChemicRegeneration.description: The natural process of accelerating metabolism and healing of wounds, by increasing energy consumption.
LanguageData.AdamantiumToxin.label: Adamantium Poisoning
LanguageData.AdamantiumToxin.description: Radiation from the material causes rejection in the nervous system, resulting in partial loss of coordination.
LanguageData.PoisonHit.label: Poisoning
LanguageData.PoisonHit.description: Chemicals in the wound cause fatigue and fatigue.
LanguageData.PoisonHit.stages.0.label: early
LanguageData.PoisonHit.stages.1.label: easy poisoning
LanguageData.PoisonHit.stages.2.label: severe poisoning
LanguageData.PoisonHit.stages.3.label: dangerous poisoning
LanguageData.ElectromagneticShock.label: Electromagnetic shock
LanguageData.ElectromagneticShock.description: Concentrated electromagnetic radiation negatively affects the basic life systems of the body.
LanguageData.ExposureChargedPlasma.label: Exposure to charged plasma
LanguageData.ExposureChargedPlasma.description: Hot plasma suppresses natural processes in the brain and leads to a partial loss of intersystem interaction.
LanguageData.EnergyOverload.label: Energy overload
LanguageData.EnergyOverload.description: Strong magnetic effects overload the nervous system.
LanguageData.InternalBleeding.label: Internal bleeding
LanguageData.InternalBleeding.description: Deep tissue damage causes numerous ruptures of blood vessels inside the body.
LanguageData.ShortStun.label: Short stun
LanguageData.ShortStun.description: Stun caused by physical effects on the senses.
LanguageData.SphereOfResurrection.label: Temporarily alive
LanguageData.SphereOfResurrection.description: Many mechanites can, for a short time, partially restore the metabolism of dead creatures, simulating consciousness.
LanguageData.ExposurePoison.label: Exposure to poison
LanguageData.ExposurePoison.description: Poisonous chemicals penetrate the victim’s tissue, slightly slowing down nerve impulses.
LanguageData.ExposurePoison_Axe.label: Exposure to poison
LanguageData.ExposurePoison_Axe.description: Poisonous chemicals penetrate the victim’s tissue, slightly slowing down nerve impulses.
LanguageData.DevastatingInjuries.label: Devastating injuries
LanguageData.CryotiumShards.label: Cryotium Shards
LanguageData.CryotiumShards.description: Small particles of cryotium cause a decrease in body temperature during evaporation inside the wound.
LanguageData.ExplosiveBullets.label: Explosive bullets
LanguageData.ExplosiveBullets.description: Explosive injuries cause significant damage to the condition.
LanguageData.BlastingBlisters.label: Blasting blisters
LanguageData.BlastingBlisters.description: Large spherical neoplasms filled with organic flammable liquid.
LanguageData.BlastingBlisters.stages.0.label: swelling
LanguageData.BlastingBlisters.stages.1.label: fermentation
LanguageData.BlastingBlisters.stages.2.label: destabilization
LanguageData.ElectricShock.label: Electric shock
LanguageData.ElectricShock.description: Overload of the nervous system caused by exposure to electric current
